title: Add storage to your Mac this Cyber Monday with these SSD and hard drive deals
content:
Macworld

Whether you have an old Mac or a new one, adding extra storage in the form of an external SSD or hard drive is a great way to speed up your Mac by freeing up space in the internal drive. It’s also a good idea to regularly back up your Mac and to do so you need a decent hard drive or SSD to back up to. With Cyber Monday sales taking place today, now is a great time to look for a great deal on storage for your Mac.

We are seeing money off on some of the SSDs and hard drives we have reviewed and recommend as the best SSDs, best hard drives, and best NAS & PCS drives for your Mac.

We find that the majority of storage deals are to be found on Amazon, but if you have a specific model in mind, it’s worth checking other retailers as well, including Best Buy, Newegg, and Walmart in the U.S., as well as Currys, Argos, and John Lewis in the U.K.

Below you can see our top picks of the best storage deals for Cyber Monday 2024. We’ll be updating this page as the discounts come in.

Want to save money on Apple products? Check out our roundup of the best Apple deals for Cyber Monday.
